courseName: International Social and Public Policy MSc
universityName: London School of Economics and Political Science
description: Ask LSE The ISPP programme addresses how states and societies respond to global challenges of social, demographic and economic change, and of poverty, migration and globalisation. It is underpinned by the LSE approach to social and public policy which is explicitly international, interdisciplinary and applied.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
